snippet: Transparency International put Greece 94th and Italy 72nd out of 176 countries in a ranking of the perception of corruption, which seems to parallel economic stability.
abstract: Transparency International puts Greece 94th and Italy 72nd out of 176 countries in a ranking of the perception of corruption, which seems to parallel economic stability; ranking places Greece as Europe's most corrupt country.
lead_paragraph: Transparency International put Greece 94th and Italy 72nd out of 176 countries in a ranking of the perception of corruption, which seems to parallel economic stability.

headline.main: Greece and Italy Are Listed Among Corrupt in Europe
headline.print_headline: Greece and Italy Are Listed Among Corrupt in Europe
